error.cannotFindJson: Hmm!  It seems that we couldn't load winnitron_options.json.  Please double check that it is in the winnitron_data folder.  If you can't find it, download it again from the Winnitron GitHub page.
error.cannotFindUserDataPathJson: Why can't we find the winnitron_userdata_path.json file?  That's not good.
error.test: Congrats!  You've successfully tested the Oops screen. :)
error.noAPIkey: You need an API key to sync!  Please get one from network.winnitron.com or change sync.type in winnitron_options.json to 'local' to skip syncing.
error.fetchPlaylistError: Error fetching playlists!  Check to make sure your API key is correct in winnitron_options.json and try again.  Or set sync.type to 'local'.
error.noLegacyControlExe: Cannot find the legacy control EXE.  Please re-install!
error.noRunGameExe: Cannot find the RunGame.exe file in the Resources folder.   Please re-install and try again!
error.couldNotFindGame: Cannot find the executable file for this game.  Please notify the owner!
error.invalidKeymap: Invalid key map - duplicate keys are not allowed.
